item.title: RCNN
item.description: Faster RCNN Region Proposal: Anchors: Different size bounding box of different aspect ratio and sizes Task to be done by RPN: Does this anchor contain a relevant object? How would we adjust this anchor to better fit the relevant object? Itâ€™s important to understand that even though anchors are defined based on the convolutional feature map, the final anchors reference the original image.
